movies.title: Christmas in the City
movies.plot: With the threat of having to close her father's candy store, Wendy and her six-year-old daughter Grace travel to the big city in hopes of making extra holiday cash to save their family store. When she's offered a job in the toy department of Wolman's, the city's biggest department store, Wendy can't wait! Her excitement doesn't last long when the store's new corporate fixer, Teanna, progressively destroys the Christmas spirit throughout the store, replacing Santa with hunky male underwear models surrounded by elfin "babes." What no one is aware of is that Teanna has in fact sacked the real Santa. Wendy reaches out to the old man, but it seems even he is giving up hope. With her daughter losing faith in the holiday, Wendy realizes the true meaning of Christmas needs to return to Wolman's before it is too late.
movies.simplePlot: To save her small-town sweet shop, a sweet woman gets a sweet job in a city department store, where she runs afoul of a female exec with no family values.

biography.bio: Ashley Williams was born on November 12, 1978 in Westchester County, New York, USA as Ashley Churchill Williams. She is an actress, known for Something Borrowed (2011), Margin Call (2011) and A Most Violent Year (2014). She has been married to Neal Dodson since May 29, 2011. They have one child.
biography.name: Ashley Williams

biography.placeOfBirth: Glen Cove, Long Island, New York, USA
biography.bio: Ashanti was born on October 13, 1980 in Glen Cove, Long Island, New York, USA as Ashanti Shequoiya Douglas. She is an actress, known for Bride & Prejudice (2004), About Time (2013) and Resident Evil: Extinction (2007).
biography.name: Ashanti

biography.bio: Jon Prescott was born on August 10, 1981 in Mountain View, California, USA as John Prescott Metcalf. He is an actor, known for Howl (2010), The Holiday (2006) and The One (2011).
biography.name: Jon Prescott

biography.bio: Shanola Hampton was born May 27 in Charleston, South Carolina, to a Car Salesman and an IRS agent. She was raised in Summerville, South Carolina with her four sisters. In college she earned a degree in Theater, with emphasis in Performance from Winthrop University along with a Masters Degree in Fine Arts from University of Illinois. She moved to Los Angeles in 2001, and began appearing in commercials. Later, she made her first guest appearance in Ryan Murphy's "Popular." Her hobbies include, traveling back to South Carolina to spend time with family, Pilates, and swimming. Her hope is to one day open a Performing Arts School.
biography.name: Shanola Hampton

biography.bio: Kylie Noelle Price is an actress, known for Christmas in the City (2013) and Modern Family (2009).
biography.name: Kylie Noelle Price

biography.bio: Beverly Leech was born on May 23, 1959 in Paris, Texas, USA as Beverly Ann Leech. She is an actress, known for Mathnet (1987), Rizzoli & Isles (2010) and NCIS (2003). She has been married to Christian J. Meoli since May 21, 1999. She was previously married to Dennis Smeal.
biography.name: Beverly Leech

biography.bio: Michael Durrell was born on October 6, 1943 in Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA. He is an actor, known for Santa Barbara (1984), Defending Your Life (1991) and V (1983).

biography.bio: Stewart Scott was born on May 13, 1963 in Waco, Texas, USA. He is an actor, known for Snow Bride (2013), Stranded in Paradise (2014) and Holiday High School Reunion (2012).

biography.bio: Duncan Joiner is an actor, known for The Disappointments Room (2016), Some Kind of Beautiful (2014) and We Bare Bears (2014).
biography.name: Duncan Joiner

biography.bio: Fred Mancuso is from Pittsburgh PA. One of four from a model-dancer mother and football playing engineer father. He comes from a creative and hard working family. He began singing, playing guitar, and acting at age 7. His father passed away when Fred was 12 from brain cancer. His mother worked and raised the four. He served in the US Air Force From 1986-1990 and was stationed in North Carolina until transferring to California to live with his brother in 1989. Fred's professional acting career began in 1990 when he was cast by John Frank Levey in "Cain," a TV pilot with Maura Tierney, and William Morgan Sheppard, who became his mentor and coach along with actor Patrick Gorman. He was a series regular in the soap opera "Dangerous women"(1991) before filming 'Made in America'(1993)_ and 'Sudden Death'(1995)_. The muse then led him to stage working in Paris France on live action "Buffalo Bill's Wild West show" as a cowboy 1996. He returned to Los Angeles and in 1998 played "Lee" in the Sam Shepard play "True west", followed by "Cymbeline" with "A Noise Within" theater group where he interned in 1999, and the Shakespeare's "As You Like it" in Los Angeles with actor/ director Joel Swetow(2000). He was in rehearsals as "Richard" in the stage production of "The Lion in Winter" when September 11th 2001 happened. He enlisted that day in the US Army and left for basic training in January 2002. He participated in Operation Iraqi Freedom in 2003 with the 3rd infantry division, and following his US Army Special Forces training deployed to Iraq and Africa in 2007, 2008, 2009, and 2010. He was briefly married in 2006 and is the father of two sons born nine months apart. Both sons were born during deployments and had to overcome insurmountable odds at early ages, they are miraculous treasures, and his champions. Fred was forced to leave the Army and returned to LA and the craft in 2012. He recently filmed_'Christmas in the city'(2013)_ and played "Finbar Skippins" in the film_'Cockroaches'(2014)_. Fred is member of the "The American Legion" and the "Veterans in Film in TV" or "VFT" in Los Angeles. He continues to be outspoken encouraging vets to utilize the VA and other resources to follow their dreams and utilize a creative path in recovery from PTSD and other life/ service connected afflictions.
biography.name: Fred Mancuso

biography.bio: Joel Rush was born on August 26, 1981. He is an actor, known for If Loving You Is Wrong (2014), Days of Our Lives (1965) and The Ropes (2011).
biography.name: Joel Rush
